administration.description: Toggles the announcements in the current channel when someone joins the server.

Sets the announcement message when someone joins the server.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the user
`%user%` - will write the user's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
Embeds are supported, json form.
Toggles the announcements in the current channel when someone leaves the server.

Sets the announcement message when someone leaves the server.
Placeholders:
`%mention%` - will mention the user
`%user%` - will write the user's username
`%server%` or `%guild%` - will put the name of the server
Embeds are supported, json form.
Sets the current channel as "mod-log" channel where I will post notifications about warn, mute, unmute, kick, ban, softban, pruneban. Provide no arguments to disable it from the current channel.

category channels.description: Deletes a category channel. The category's ID is supported.
Renames a category channel. Separate the old name from the new name with '->'. The category's ID is supported.
Adds a text channel to a category channel. Separate the channel name from the category name with '->'. The category's ID and text channel's ID are supported.
Adds a voice channel to a category channel. Separate the channel name from the category name with '->'. The category's ID and voice channel's ID are supported.

emotes.description: Adds an emote in this server. PNG, JPG or GIF supported. The image's size must be under 256 KB.
Deletes an emote from this server. 'Mentioning' the emote is supported.
Renames an emote on this server. Separate the old name by the new name with '->'. 'Mentioning' the emotes are supported.

moderation.description: I will kick an user. If you provide a reason message I will DM the user with the reason.
I will ban an user. If you provide a reason message I will DM the user with the reason.
I will ban an user with the option to remove his messages from last 7 days, and then unban it. The result is a kick.
I will ban an user with the option to remove his messages from last 7 days. Different from "softban" where the user is unbanned.

`[prefix]prune x` removes last x number of messages from the channel (up to 100).
`[prefix]prune @User` removes all User's messages in the last 100 messages.

help.description: Shows a help info for a command, or shows the general help info if no arguments are given.
Shows a list with all modules and submodules.
Shows a list with all commands of a module or submodule.
I will DM you with all commands.
